title: Update Home page Our Team member name to Yash Gorivale

requirements.text: Update the Home page "Our Team" section so the team member currently shown as "Amit Patel" is displayed as "Yash Gorivale".

quotes: on home page Our Team section

acceptanceCriteria: In the Home page "Our Team" section, the card that previously displayed the name "Amit Patel" now displays "Yash Gorivale".
No instances of the name "Amit Patel" remain in the Our Team data used by the Home page.
The change is implemented in the shared team member data source (frontend/src/config/team.ts) so the rendered OurTeamSection component reflects the updated name without hardcoding in the component.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep backend unchanged; no new canisters or backend APIs are needed for this static UI content update.
nonGoals: Do not change the team member role/title, image, or ordering unless explicitly requested.
Do not add new team members or redesign the Our Team section layout.
